title: Adverse effects and its interference
fullText:
Electrical equipment shall be selected so that, during normal operation, including switching, it will not cause harmful effects to other equipment.
Factors that may need to be considered include the following:
(a)	Power factor.
(b)	Excessive voltage fluctuations.
(c)	Severe distortion of current waveforms.
(d)	Electromagnetic emissions.
NOTE: IEC 60945 and IEC 60950-1 or AS/NZS 60950.1 should be referred to for equipment that could cause electromagnetic disturbance.
